titleStmt.title: The Opinions of several learned antiquaries touching the antiquity, power, order, state, persons, manner, and proceedings of the high court of Parliament in England viz. Dodridge, Agar, Tate, Camden, Holland, Cotton, Selden.
titleStmt.author: Elsynge, Henry, 1598-1654. Method of passing bills in Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.L. for Matt. Gilliflower,

notesStmt.note: "The method of passing bills in Parliament, written by Henry Elsinge": p. 1-33 (2nd grouping).
"The method of passing bills in Parliament" has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
